Replying to @soulislove 2018-10-17 22:30
@soulislove @TheRealNooshu @SiteSpeedio @Netlify I suspect you might want to set custom headers in what is being served by @Netlify. You can have complete control over that via either _headers file or the netlify.toml config. Docs are here: https://t.co/Re1E3LtmKh
